name: ankara
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Turkey, in the central part of the country: Coach services from Istanbul to Ankara are frequent and inexpensive. After a long meeting at the prime minister's office in Ankara, the government reached a compromise on this controversial issue.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Ankara the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Ankara.Oran is a professor of international relations at Ankara University.
